room_title: Escape room "Fortune Teller" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: The Voodoo Room was absolutely amazing! We had a blast! I highly recommend this!

room_title: Escape room "Fortune Teller" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Our family had so much fun solving puzzles and clues in the Voodoo Room! This venue is so well put together. If you're looking for something to do these escape rooms are perfect! We are looking forward to doing another one soon.

room_title: Escape room "Fortune Teller" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Although we died and did not make it out of the Voodoo Curse room, we had a blast and can not wait to try all the other rooms. The actor was amazing including his authentic time period costumes and accent.
